articles.title: Amid Backlash to Antisemitic Post, Harvard Professor Resigns as PSC Faculty Adviser, FSJP Member | News - Harvard Crimson

articles.author: James Powel
articles.title: American admits to attacking 2 US women in Germany, killing 1 of them - USA TODAY
articles.description: The 31-year-old American man has admitted to charges of murder and rape involving two American women in Germany over the summer.
articles.content:
A man has admitted to attacking two young American women and killing one of them in Germany over the summer, multiple German news outlets are reporting.
